# NSRelativeSpecifier.RelativePosition

**Enumeration**

These constants are used by [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSRelativeSpecifier/relativePosition-swift.property] and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSRelativeSpecifier/relativePosition-swift.property].

## Declaration

```swift
enum RelativePosition
```

## Constants

- **NSRelativeSpecifier.RelativePosition.after**: Specifies a position after another object.
- **NSRelativeSpecifier.RelativePosition.before**: Specifies a position before another object.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
